frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-random-wallpaper
frozen.shortDescription: Fetch a random wallpaper from an online source and set it as a desktop background.
frozen.longDescription:
Fetch a random wallpaper from an online source and set it as a desktop background. 
The desktop background can be updated periodically or manually.

Features:
Many different online sources with filters:
        - Unsplash (https://unsplash.com/)
        - Wallhaven (https://alpha.wallhaven.cc/)
        - Reddit (https://reddit.com)
        - Basically any JSON API/File (see Examples on GitHub)
History of previous images
Set lock screen image
Automatic renewal (Auto-Fetching)
